package_name: OWASP Top 10 for LLM Applications 2025 Package
author: OpenGuardrails
description: LLM01:2025 Prompt Injection; LLM02:2025 System Prompt Leakage

scanners.name: Prompt Attacks
scanners.definition: Prompt attacks, including through prompt injection, role-playing attacks, or system prompt manipulation to manipulate, bypass, jailbreak, or exploit AI systems
